profile.name: Armin Ronacher
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Earendil
profile.summary: Highly motivated and versatile software developer with a passion for open-source projects and technical innovation.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Leading the development of pi-mono, a monorepo for pi packages, and actively contributing to its growth.
Exploring the use case of prompt generators and implementing a pure slop demo within the project.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developing Go and Python projects, including self-replace and insta-cmd utility libraries.
Collaborating with clients on various software development tasks.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributing to the growth and maintenance of open-source projects such as gh-issue-sync and minijinja.
Participating in discussions and providing feedback on project development.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developing Rust and TypeScript projects, including agent-stuff utility libraries.
Delivering high-quality software solutions to clients.
